TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PngBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class PngBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: Définit un encodeur qui est utilisé pour encoder des images au format PNG (Portable Network Graphics).

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] format bitmaps prise en charge de frame de métadonnées.format bitmaps support frame level metadata. Ils ne gèrent pas la version préliminaire, miniatures globales, les miniatures de niveau trame, métadonnées globales ou plusieurs frames.They do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. Encodage ne fonctionne pas avec une confiance partielle.Encoding does not work in partial trust. Consultez [sécurité de confiance partielle de WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) pour plus d’informations sur la confiance partielle.See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples L’exemple suivant montre comment initialiser un pour encoder une nouvelle image bitmap.The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption Interlace { System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: Obtient ou définit une valeur qui indique si le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] bitmap doit entrelacer.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] bitmap should interlace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks L’entrelacement fait référence au processus d’affichage d’un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame dans deux champs.Interlacing refers to the process of displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame in two fields. Un champ contient le même du frame, et l’autre contient les lignes impaires du frame.One field contains the even lines of the frame, and the other field contains the odd lines of the frame. Lorsque le [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] est affiché, les lignes dans un champ sont affichées en premier, puis les lignes dans le deuxième champ sont affichés.When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] is viewed, the lines in one field are displayed first, and then the lines in the second field are displayed. ## Examples L’exemple suivant montre comment utiliser le propriété.The following example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
